TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivatedClientTypeEntry extends System.Runtime.Remoting.TypeEntry

summary.span: 将在客户端注册的对象类型的值保存为可以在服务器上激活的类型。

span.span: Holds values for an object type registered on the client end as a type that can be activated on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在客户端上创建客户端激活对象的实例，你必须知道其，并且它必须注册客户端上使用方法。To create an instance of a client-activated object on the client, you must know its and it must be registered on the client by using the method. 若要获取的客户端必须先注册的客户端激活的对象的新实例的代理具有通道通过调用，再激活对象`new`。To obtain a proxy for a new instance of the client-activated object the client must first register a channel with and then activate the object by calling `new`. 若要激活的客户端激活对象类型`new`关键字，必须先注册使用的客户端上的对象类型方法。To activate a client-activated object type with the `new` keyword, you must first register the object type on the client using the method. 通过调用将向远程处理基础结构远程应用程序的位置其中`new`尝试创建它。By calling you are giving the remoting infrastructure the location of the remote application where `new` attempts to create it. 另一方面，如果您使用方法创建的新实例的客户端激活对象，则必须提供远程应用程序的 URL 作为参数，因此不不必要的客户端上注册任何之前。If, on the other hand, you use the method to create a new instance of the client-activated object, you must supply the remote application's URL as a parameter, so no prior registration on the client end is necessary. 若要提供与服务器的 URL 的方法必须在要创建对象，封装实例中的 URL类。To supply the method with the URL of the server on which you want to create the object, you must encapsulate the URL in an instance of the class. 有关客户端激活对象和激活远程对象的详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25)。For a detailed description of client activated objects and remote object activation see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用若要注册客户端激活远程对象。The following code example shows how to use a to register a client activated remote object. 此示例包含三个部分、 客户端、 服务器和使用客户端和服务器的远程对象。The example contains three parts, a client, a server, and a remote object used by the client and server. 下面的代码示例演示了客户端：The following code example shows a client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CPP/activatedclienttypeentry_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CS/activatedclienttypeentry_client.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例显示了为此客户端的服务器：The following code example shows a server for this client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CPP/activatedclienttypeentry_server.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.ActivatedClientTypeEntry/CS/activatedclienttypeentry_server.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例提供了使用客户端和服务器的远程对象：The following code example provides the remote object used by the client and the server: remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，此索引器未实现，对它的操作不会生成任何结果。Currently, this indexer is not implemented and operations on it will not produce any results. 属性提供上下文属性，这些时添加到，可以强制执行策略，如同步或事务。 attributes provide context properties that, when added to a , can enforce policies such as synchronization or transactions.
